description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve firmware issues related to Secure Boot on HP devices using Sure Start Security:

1. Visit the official HP support page to find the latest firmware updates for your device.
2. Download and install the latest firmware update to ensure compatibility with Secure Boot updates.

**Details**:
- Make sure to check the specific requirements for your HP device as updates might be contingent on the current firmware version installed. Ensure your system is backed up before proceeding with the firmware update. Updating firmware can involve interruptions in service, so plan accordingly. (LLM Synthesized)
